panel.label: Patreon Support
panel.name: patreon_panel
panel.text_editor:
Much thanks to all Patrons who pledged money via Patreon to support this Viewer's development. The following list contains all Patrons who pledged at any point at least the minimum amount possible.

panel.label: Special Thanks
panel.name: licenses_panel
panel.text_editor:
Heres a List of Special Thanks to all people that helped my Viewer , implemented a Feature or something for the UI
Aimee Arcana: Additional Water Normalmaps
Andromeda Rage: Derender
Arrehn Oberlander: Qarls Aligning Tool Tweaks & Fixes
Chalice Yao: Touch & Sit protection
Dannyy Collazo: Script toolbar button icon
Geenz Spad: Blinn Phong Speculars High Precision Floating Point Frame Buffers Gamma Correction Color Correction Color Grading Tone Mapping Vignette Effect
Kitty Barnett: RLVa Support & Updates
L4n4: Donations
Luna Jubilee: Windlight Presets (from her blog)
Marine Kelley: *Mouselook grabbing Non-hiding UI in Mouselook
Mechatoy Mekanic: Sponsoring www.mechtoys.com http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Axell/185/128/21
Miguael Liamano: Additional Windlight Presets
Oz Linden: TPV Check & Pass
Qarl Fizz: Qarls Aligning Tool
TankMaster Finesmith: Optional Chat Range Rings Qarls Aligning Tool Tweaks & Fixes
Tofu Buzzard Atmospheric Haze Fix Better SSAO Faster DoF Screen Space Reflections Godrays
Zi Ree: Fading Teleport Screen Pie Menus Texture Refresh
feel free to IM me if you can tell me missing names and/or find more stuff others did!
